answers.answer: Do you have any swelling? I'd at least go to Thee y pharmacy and get your bp taken. Preeclampsia can be very serious for you and baby, so I'd want to know what my bp is if you're feeling that way. Make sure you're staying hydrated too!

question: I'm 24w3d & am already on medication for high blood pressure. It has been under control for the most part thus far. Last night my husband said I felt kinda warm, but I didn't think much about it. This morning I still feel warm, have a dull headache & cramp-like pains in my lower back. I am currently out of town visiting my husband & cannot get to my regular doctor. (I did call & they said to go to the ER if it gets worse) Should I be worried enough to go to the ER or just wait it out & see if it gets better?
title: High blood pressure concerns. Is this normal?
